titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Overseas Office, Asia
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Overseas Office, Asia FA1673

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-09 03:06:12 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Overseas Office, Asia

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Administrative records, program records, correspondence and subject files.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Currently consists of two collections the primary Hanoi Field Office records, and the associated Office Files of Charles R. Bailey.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at https://rockarch.org/collections/access-and-request-materials/#citations
